description:
Layer up to take on changing conditions with this technical hoody. The low-profile design has minimalist leanings and sports an elasticised, helmet compatible hood that won’t impair your visibility. Outstanding stretch provides freedom of movement when you're hiking, scrambling or climbing.

  • Made of recycled polyester and spandex stretch double-weave fabric that adds warmth but breathes well to avoid overheating
  • Fabric is wind and water resistant thanks to a PFC-free DWR finish
  • Stretch fabric is designed for overhead reach and a wide range of movement
  • Under-the-helmet hood is bound with soft elastic providing coverage and visibility
  • High handwarmer pockets and low-bulk hem for comfort under a harness or hipbelt
  • Partially elasticized, low-profile cuffs resist snagging
name: Patagonia R1 CrossStrata Hoody - Women's
